definitions.text: the irregular motion of waves (usually caused by wind blowing in a direction opposite to the tide)
examples: the boat headed into the chop

definitions.text: a small cut of meat including part of a rib

examples: I'll hit him on the chops

definitions.text: a tennis return made with a downward motion that puts backspin on the ball
a grounder that bounces high in the air

examples: chop a hole in the ground

definitions.text: strike sharply, as in some sports
